LIST.TITLE: Income Access Reports
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Below is a list of all scheduled or ad-hoc reports on income access activity.

REPORT.TITLE: Income Access Report
REPORT.DESCRIPTION: A income access report that contains the summary financial details for a player per the configured parameters below.

DOMAIN.NAME: Domain Name
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: The domain to which this report applies.

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Report Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: A descriptive note that describes this report.

CREATEDON.NAME: Created On
CREATEDON.DESCRIPTION: The date and time that this report was created.

CREATEDBY.NAME: Created By
CREATEDBY.DESCRIPTION: The user that created this report.

REPORTRUN.TITLE: Report Run
REPORTRUN.DESCRIPTION: Below are the results of a single run of the report. Select 'Download Excel' to retrieve a copy of the report in Excel format.

REPORT.TITLE: Email Template Placeholders - (Send Full Report Via Email, Send Report Stats Via Email)
REPORT.NAME: Report Name

CREATE.TITLE: Income Access Report - Add
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Use the form below to create a income access report

DOMAIN.NAME: Domain
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: The domain for this income access report
DOMAIN.PLACEHOLDER: Select the domain for this income access report

NAME.NAME: Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name of this income access report

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: A description of this income access report

ALLFILTERSAPPLICABLE.NAME: All Filters Applicable
ALLFILTERSAPPLICABLE.DESCRIPTION: If checked, all filters must apply, otherwise one or more

IADATAPERIOD.NAME: Income Access Data Period
IADATAPERIOD.DESCRIPTION: The period of income access data to accumulate for this report
IADATAPERIOD.PLACEHOLDER: Select the Income Access Data Period

IADATAPERIODOFFSET.NAME: Income Access Data Period Offset
IADATAPERIODOFFSET.DESCRIPTION: The Offset Based on the Income Access Data Period. For example, if Income Access Data Period is set to Day, set Income Access Data Period Offset to 1 for yesterday's data, 2 for data from two days ago, and so on. Similarly, if Income Access Data Period is set to Month, set Income Access Data Period Offset to 1 for last months data, 2 for data from two months ago, and so on.

GGRDEDUCTIONPERCENTAGE.NAME: Income Access Gross Gaming Revenue Deduction
GGRDEDUCTIONPERCENTAGE.DESCRIPTION: The percentage to be deducted from the gross gaming revenue for fees, kyc and licensing during the net gaming revenue calculation.
GGRDEDUCTIONPERCENTAGE.PATTERN: Format needs to be a percentage number with decimals. 99.99

COMPAREXPERIODS.NAME: Compare x Periods
COMPAREXPERIODS.DESCRIPTION: The number of periods to generate comparative sheets for, based on Income Access Data Period (GDP) and Income Access Data Period Offset (GDPO). For example, if GDP is set to Year, and GDPO is set to 1, - set Compare x Periods to 2 to generate comparative sheets for 3 years ago and 2 years ago, as well as the regular sheet for last year.

ENABLED.NAME: Enabled
ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: The status of the report, enabled or disabled

DAYOFWEEK.NAME: Day of Week
DAYOFWEEK.DESCRIPTION: The day of week for the schedule
DAYOFWEEK.PLACEHOLDER: Select the day of the week

DAYOFMONTH.NAME: Day of Month
DAYOFMONTH.DESCRIPTION: The day of the month for the schedule
DAYOFMONTH.PLACEHOLDER: Select the day of the month

HOUR.NAME: Hour
HOUR.DESCRIPTION: The hour of day for the schedule

MINUTE.NAME: Minute
MINUTE.DESCRIPTION: The minute of the hour for the schedule

OPERATOR.NAME: Operator
OPERATOR.DESCRIPTION: The operator to use for filtration

XDAYSAGO.NAME: X Days Ago
XDAYSAGO.DESCRIPTION: The number of days ago. For example, 0 is today, 1 is yesterday, 2 is two days ago, and so on
XDAYSAGO.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the number of days ago

TYPE.NAME: Type
TYPE.DESCRIPTION: The type of action to perform

EMAILTEMPLATE.NAME: Email Template Name
EMAILTEMPLATE.DESCRIPTION: The email template to use for the action
